entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 04:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
